changeSet.author: bahadir.tasdemir
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO zone (id, name, fulfillment_type_ft, fulfillment_type_st, fulfillment_type_mp, created_date, last_modified_date) VALUES(nextval('seq_zone'), 'Turkey', true, true, false, current_timestamp, current_timestamp); INSERT INTO zone (id, name, fulfillment_type_ft, fulfillment_type_st, fulfillment_type_mp, created_date, last_modified_date) VALUES(nextval('seq_zone'), 'Germany', false, false, false, current_timestamp, current_timestamp);
